actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill relating to the age and service requirements for the resignation and retirement of justices and judges of the United States.

summary.text: Revises the resignation and retirement for age provisions governing any justice or judge of the United States by prescribing a schedule correlating attained age with years of service, in a one-year-of-age to one-year-of-service ratio, beginning with age 62 and 18 years of service and ending with age 70 and 10 years of service. (Amends 28, U.S.C. 371)

titles.title: A bill relating to the age and service requirements for the resignation and retirement of justices and judges of the United States.
